alert.note: Alert for Broward (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 05 at 1:17PM EDT until further notice by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Florida, including the following county, Broward. * WHEN...Until 215 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 116 PM EDT, The public reported urban and small stream flooding due to heavy rain from thunderstorms. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Dania Beach, Fort Lauderdale - Hollywood International Airport, Ravenswood Estates, Port Everglades, Estates Of Fort Lauderdale, Downtown Fort Lauderdale, Intersection I-595 And I-95, Hollywood Downtown and Fort Lauderdale Beach. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
